verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lift your voices unto the Lord
Glad hosannas ringing
Come and praise Him Christ our King
Forever and forever
Lift your voices loudly sing
Thank Him now for everything
Come and praise Him Christ our King
Forever and forever

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lift your hands unto the Lord
Praises never ceasing
We shall praise Him Christ our King
Forever and forever
Lift your hands and now proclaim
He is Lord over everything
We shall praise Him Christ our King
Forever and forever

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lift your heart unto the Lord
Lives that match your praising
Represent Him Christ our King
Forever and forever
Lift your hearts, your treasure bring
Give to Him your everything
Live to serve Him Christ our King
Forever and forever
